Name.title: Identifier
Name.description: Must be unique to other collections in the catalog. Letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores only.

EodashIdentifier.description: Identifier that will be used in eodashboard or RACE instance

Title.description: Title used to describe the collection

Description.description: Description of the collection written as markdown

Resources.description: Required: List of resources (interfaces to data) provided by the collection (usually one entry)

Themes.description: List of theme strings that represent the collection

Tags.description: List of tag strings that represent the collection

Agency.description: List of agency strings that represent the collection

anyOf.description: A string for the Collection's SPDX License identifier
A list of custom License objects

License.description: Either a string for the Collection's SPDX License identifier or if none apply a list of custom License objects

Citation.description: Citation object containing information on citation aspects of data

Image.description: Relative path (which root is taken from the assets_endpoint configured for the catalog) to a preview image file

Legend.description: Relative path (which root is taken from the assets_endpoint configured for the catalog) to colormap legend image file

Subcollections.description: List of Subcollections that are integrated into the defined collection. When used no Resources should be defined, thes Resources of the linked subcollections are used.

Services.description: List of Service objects provided by the collection (typically will only be one service)

References.description: List of Reference objects that further describe the collection

Colorlegend.description: Colorlegend object that describes how the colorlegend should be displayed

CollectionGroup.description: (Optional) identifier that can be used to group collections/indicators in eodash using the collection_group property for grouping in the configuration

Process.description: Configuration of the process of the collection

def.description: Definition of the projection using proj4 format, e.g. "+proj=longlat +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"

extent.description: Bounding box of the projection in projected coordinates [minX, minY, maxX, maxY]

JsonForm.description: URL to the JSONform of the process

VegaDefinition.description: URL to the Vega definition of the process

EndPoints.description: List of endpoints that are used in the process

Type.description: MIME type of the returned data

EndPoint.description: The type of custom endpoint e.g `eoxhub_workspaces`, `sentinelhub`, `veda` ...

Body.description: URL to the body of the endpoint

Url.description: **Required** Url to location where license text can be located

Type.description: Media Type string, defaults to text/html (for websites), other typical cases would be application/pdf for pdf documents

DOI.description: The DOI of the data, e.g. 10.1000/xyz123. This MUST NOT be a DOIs link

Citation.description: The recommended human-readable reference (citation) to be used by publications citing the data

DOI.description: The DOI of a publication referencing the data. This MUST NOT be a DOIs link.

Citation.description: Citation of a publication referencing the data.

Name.description: The name of the organization or the individual.

Description.description: Description of the provider. Markdown may be used for rich text representation.

Roles.description: Roles of the provider. Any of licensor, producer, processor or host

Url.description: Homepage on which the provider describes the dataset and publishes contact information.

DataProjection.description: Projection in which the data is stored

MapProjection.description: Projection in which the data is visualized, defaults to projection configured in eodash

CollectionId.description: Identifier of the data collection of SH

Script.description: Relative path (which root is taken from the assets_endpoint configured for the catalog) to a javascript evalscript

Title.description: Descriptive title for the referenced algorithm

title.description: Text added to legend as title

range.description: List of hex colors strings which will be interpolated or used for categories

domain.description: List of domain entries, usually minimum and maximum value of domain, list of strings when using categorical scaleType

tickFormat.description: Expression of how numbers should be formatted, e.g. ".0f"

tickValues.description: List of numbers for which tick values should be shown

markType.description: When using "categorical" type allows to define symbol to be used

Spaceborne.description: Information if the source is spaceborn.

InSitu.description: List of in situ data sources.

Other.description: List of other data sources that are not covered by spaceborn or in situ.

Satellite.description: List of satellite identifiers that produced the data.

Sensor.description: List of sensors (on the satellite) that produced the data.

Bbox.description: Bounding box of the collection [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] based on the World Geodetic System (WGS84) format

Timedelta.description: Time delta to be applied to the start and end date

DateTimeInterval.description: Date time interval to be applied to the collection

CopernicusMarineDataStoreWMTSResource.title: Copernicus Marine Data Store WMTS Resource

anyOf.description: Single URL of the flatstyle applied to all resources of the process.
Mappings of output type to flatstyle url

Identifier.description: Identifier of output of the process to match with flatstyle.
